definition: to succeed/to finish/to complete/to accomplish/to become/to turn into/to be all right/OK!/one tenth
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]
(idiom) nurture makes second nature/good habits come by long assimilation

sentences.english: The suspect is a Spartan dog but he is surprisingly gentle to his little son.
sentences.chinese: 那个嫌疑犯嗜杀成性，但对自己的小儿子却异常温柔。

sentences.english: His mother is rather angry at his laziness.
sentences.chinese: 由于他懒惰成性，他母亲大为生气。

sentences.english: Drinking a Little comforts a day, but being used to hitting the bottle will paralyse all your senses.
sentences.chinese: 小酒宜情，但是酗酒成性会麻痹你所有的心智。

sentences.english: Perhaps you thought the oil companies were just being greedy.
sentences.chinese: 或许你会认为油企贪婪成性。

sentences.english: John was too lazy to work and too proud to beg.
sentences.chinese: 约翰懒惰成性，不愿工作，又心高气傲，不肯乞讨。

sentences.english: The boy has a good enough brain but he's bone idle and won't study.
sentences.chinese: 这个男孩脑子十分好，但就是懒惰成性，不肯学习。

sentences.english: The general is a real butcher.
sentences.chinese: 那将军是个嗜杀成性的人。

sentences.english: The drawing-rooms of predatory new-rich women.
sentences.chinese: 掠夺成性的女暴发户们的客厅。
侵略成性的国家威胁这世界和平。

sentences.english: His brutal nature, notorious, it is always less than fear.
sentences.chinese: 他凶残成性，恶名远播，人们总是避之惟恐不及。

sentences.english: Don't encourage him in his idle ways.
If we remain inveterate smokers, it is only because we have so often experienced.
sentences.chinese: 让一个嗜烟成性的瘾君子放弃香烟是很困难的。

sentences.english: His laziness and greed will soon make trouble for him.
sentences.chinese: 他的懒惰成性和贪婪一定会让他惹上麻烦的。

definition: to be greedy in getting money
avaricious and insatiable (idiom); greedy and never satisfied
greedy for sex/given to lust for women
happy to partake but not prepared to do any work (idiom)/all take and no give
